channel.title: In the bugs section of SRL, why not lock the solved bugs?
channel.description:
In the bugs section of SRL, why not lock the solved bugs?
It would be missleading for some people to go in there and say aww darn the ______ ______ stilldoesn't work. :rolleyes:

item.title: In the bugs section of SRL, why not lock the solved bugs?
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

yes i agree,

the newbox getcolor bug was fixed with SRL 3.0 but i think the thread is still there :eek:

Read full topic
